name: HR360Ltd
slogan: Provision of talent solutions for Start Ups and SME's
description:
We offer 4 main solutions to our clients, namely partnering with them to 'Build'; 'Grow'; 'Recruit' and 'Retain' their talent.    

• Build: We assist with any day to day HR needs that you have including building policies; procedures; processes and advising on any employee relations issues encountered. 
• Recruit: We help companies who are largely scaling at a rapid pace and offer either a retainer or placement fee structure to find the best talent there is for them. 
• Retain: Through our ‘5 pulse model’ framework, we partner with companies to create and sustain a meaningful and memorable employee experience to retain top talent. 
• Grow: We offer numerous learning & development interventions to growing companies needing to upskill their staff such as leadership programmes, management coaching; team building & development etc.

jobs.title: Junior Marketing Analyst (Swedish)
jobs.description:
This is an opportunity to join a fast-growing online marketing and software development agency focused on delivering optimal results for clients within the I-gaming industry. With an enormous presence in the English & Scandinavian markets, they provide their Clients with services including Digital and offline Marketing; Website Design; Software Development and Customer Retention Management.



Due to recent rapid growth, they are now looking to further expand these markets and seek an ambitious graduate looking to kick start their marketing career to assist in the expansion and development of their Online Retention operations.



Role Overview



As a Retention Executive you will be responsible for managing your own portfolio of online marketing campaigns for a number of brands within the Swedish market. You will manage the full 360 process, including executing, measuring and optimizing your campaigns to maximising ROI.



Key Performance Areas:



1. Campaign Management: Management and delivery of several hundred multi-channel campaigns within an allocated marketing, including:



- HTML E-Mail
- SMS marketing
- Site/mobile messaging etc.



2. Analysis: Measuring and optimising campaign performance within a market in order to maximise profitability using company set KPIs, including:



- Email metrics (open rates, click through rates, etc.)
- Excel, Pivot Tables and Power BI



3. Innovation



- Set targets for innovative campaigns with Team Leads
- Perform A/B Testing
- Document and report these outcomes to the team



Skills Required:

Fluent in both English and Swedish
A recent graduate in any subject
A passion for marketing and eager to kick-start a career in marketing
Analytical and passionate about data
CRM experience (desirable)
Exceptionally accurate with outstanding attention to detail
Excellent workload management and organisational skills
Bubbly, positive personality
Hungry to learn and develop and take responsibility for your own brands and market
